verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> He departed <S%G3332><s%> from Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> into the region <S%G3725><s%> of Judea <S%G2453><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan; <S%G2446><s%>
and great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> Him, and He healed <S%G2323><s%> them there. <S%G1563><s%>

And [some] Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him, testing <S%G3985><s%> Him, and saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> [for a man] to divorce <S%G630><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> for any <S%G3956><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> at all <S%G3956><s%>?"

And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Have you not read, <S%G314><s%> that He who created <S%G2936><s%> [them] from the beginning <S%G746><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them male <S%G7021><s%> and female, <S%G2338><s%>

and said, <S%G3004><s%> 'For this <S%G3778><s%> cause <S%G1752><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> shall leave <S%G2641><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> and mother, <S%G3384><s%> and shall cleave <S%G2853><s%> to his wife; <S%G1135><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> shall become <S%G1510><s%> <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>'?

"Consequently <S%G5620><s%> they are no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> but one <S%G1520><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has joined <S%G4801><s%> together, <S%G4801><s%> let no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G444><s%> separate <S%G5563><s%>."

They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Why <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> did Moses <S%G3475><s%> command <S%G1781><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> her a certificate <S%G975><s%> of divorce <S%G647><s%> and send <S%G630><s%> [her] away <S%G630><s%>?"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Because <S%G4314><s%> of your hardness <S%G4641><s%> of heart, <S%G4641><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> permitted <S%G2010><s%> you to divorce <S%G630><s%> your wives; <S%G1135><s%> but from the beginning <S%G746><s%> it has not been <S%G1096><s%> this <S%G3779><s%> way. <S%G3779><s%>

"And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> divorces <S%G630><s%> his wife, <S%G1135><s%> except <S%G3361><s%> for immorality, <S%G4202><s%> and marries <S%G1060><s%> another <S%G243><s%> woman <S%G243><s%> commits <S%G3429><s%> adultery. <S%G3429><s%>"

The disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "If <S%G1487><s%> the relationship <S%G156><s%> of the man <S%G444><s%> with his wife <S%G1135><s%> is like <S%G3779><s%> this, <S%G3779><s%> it is better <S%G4851><s%> not to marry. <S%G1060><s%>"

But He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Not all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G3956><s%> [can] accept <S%G5562><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> statement, <S%G3056><s%> but [only] those to whom <S%G3739><s%> it has been given. <S%G1325><s%>

"For there are eunuchs <S%G2135><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> were born <S%G1080><s%> that way <S%G3779><s%> from their mother's womb; <S%G2836><s%> and there are eunuchs <S%G2135><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> were made <S%G2134><s%> eunuchs <S%G2134><s%> by men; <S%G444><s%> and there are [also] eunuchs <S%G2135><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> made <S%G2134><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> eunuchs <S%G2134><s%> for the sake <S%G1223><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%> He who is able <S%G1410><s%> to accept <S%G5562><s%> [this,] let him accept <S%G5562><s%> [it."]

Then <S%G5119><s%> [some] children <S%G3813><s%> were brought <S%G4374><s%> to Him so <S%G2443><s%> that He might lay <S%G2007><s%> His hands <S%G5495><s%> on them and pray; <S%G4336><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them.

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Let <S%G863><s%> the children <S%G3813><s%> alone, <S%G863><s%> and do not hinder <S%G2967><s%> them from coming <S%G2064><s%> to Me; for the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> belongs <S%G1510><s%> to such <S%G5108><s%> as these. <S%G5108><s%>"
And after laying <S%G2007><s%> His hands <S%G5495><s%> on them, He departed <S%G4198><s%> from there. <S%G1564><s%>

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing <S%G18><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%> that I may obtain <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>?"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Why <S%G5101><s%> are you asking <S%G2065><s%> Me about <S%G4012><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> is good <S%G18><s%>? There is [only] One <S%G1520><s%> who is good; <S%G18><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> you wish <S%G2309><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into life, <S%G2222><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments. <S%G1785><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Which <S%G4169><s%> ones <S%G4169><s%>?" And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G5346><s%> "You shall not commit <S%G5407><s%> murder; <S%G5407><s%> You shall not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery; <S%G3431><s%> You shall not steal; <S%G2813><s%> You shall not bear <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> witness; <S%G5576><s%>
Honor <S%G5091><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and mother; <S%G3384><s%> and You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%> "

The young <S%G3495><s%> man <S%G3495><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I have kept; <S%G5442><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> am <S%G5302><s%> I still <S%G2089><s%> lacking <S%G5302><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, "If <S%G1487><s%> you wish <S%G2309><s%> to be complete, <S%G5046><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> [and] sell <S%G4453><s%> your possessions <S%G5225><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> to [the] poor, <S%G4434><s%> and you shall have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in heaven; <S%G3772><s%> and come, <S%G1204><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> Me."

But when the young <S%G3495><s%> man <S%G3495><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> statement, <S%G3056><s%> he went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> grieved; <S%G3076><s%> for he was one who owned <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> property. <S%G2933><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, it is hard <S%G1423><s%> for a rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

" And again <S%G3825><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, it is easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go through <S%G1223><s%> the eye <S%G5144><s%> of a needle, <S%G4476><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"

And when the disciples <S%G3101><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> [this,] they were very <S%G4970><s%> astonished <S%G1605><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Then <S%G686><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> be saved <S%G4982><s%>?"

And looking <S%G1689><s%> upon [them] Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "With men <S%G444><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is impossible, <S%G102><s%> but with God <S%G2316><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are possible. <S%G1415><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we have left <S%G863><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> You; what <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G686><s%> will there be for us?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that you who have followed <S%G190><s%> Me, in the regeneration <S%G3824><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will sit <S%G2523><s%> on His glorious <S%G1391><s%> throne, <S%G2362><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> shall sit <S%G2521><s%> upon twelve <S%G1427><s%> thrones, <S%G2362><s%> judging <S%G2919><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

"And everyone <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> has left <S%G863><s%> houses <S%G3614><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sisters <S%G79><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> farms <S%G68><s%> for My name's sake, <S%G1752><s%> shall receive <S%G2983><s%> many <S%G4179><s%> times <S%G4179><s%> as much, <S%G4179><s%> and shall inherit <S%G2816><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
"But many <S%G4183><s%> [who are] first <S%G4413><s%> will be last; <S%G2078><s%> and [the] last, <S%G2078><s%> first. <S%G4413><s%>
